text: Spider-Noir (2026) is an upcoming live-action series produced by Sony Pictures Television in association with Lord Miller Productions. It will be distributed by Amazon Prime Video and is intended to release in 2026. Nicolas Cage stars in the series as Spider-Noir and is joined in the cast by Brendan Gleeson, Abraham Popoola, Li Jun li, Karen Rodriguez, Jack Huston, and Oscar Isaac in supporting roles.
title: Spider-Noir
